hero.name: Salama Malek
hero.heading: Hey! I'm Salama
hero.description: ITI graduate and skilled Full Stack Web Developer with a passion for software development. Seeking entry-level opportunities to apply technical expertise in MEAN stack, back-end and front-end programming, and mobile app development.

about.title: I AM AVAILABLE FOR FULL STACK PROJECTS
about.description: ITI graduate and skilled Full Stack Web Developer with a passion for software development. Committed to delivering innovative solutions and fostering growth in dynamic and collaborative environments. I specialize in MEAN stack development, but I'm also proficient in other technologies like Laravel, Ruby on Rails, and Django.

details.title: E-commerce Platform using MEAN Stack
details.description: Developed a full-featured e-commerce platform using MongoDB, Express.js, Angular, and Node.js. Implemented features including user authentication, product catalog, shopping cart, and payment processing integration.

details.title: Cross-platform Mobile Application
details.description: Built a cross-platform mobile application using React Native that allows users to track their fitness goals, record workouts, and connect with fitness trainers.

details.title: Admin Dashboard for Content Management
details.description: Created an intuitive admin dashboard using Angular for content management with features including user management, content creation, analytics, and reporting tools.

details.title: Educational Platform with Laravel
details.description: Developed an educational platform using Laravel that allows instructors to create courses, upload learning materials, and interact with students.

details.title: Blog Platform using MERN Stack
details.description: Created a blogging platform using MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js with features including user authentication, content creation, commenting, and social sharing.

details.title: Corporate Website using WordPress
details.description: Designed and developed a corporate website using WordPress with custom themes and plugins to meet specific business requirements.

allService.title: Full Stack Development
allService.subTitle: Expert in MEAN stack development, building complete web applications with MongoDB, Express.js, Angular, and Node.js.

allService.title: Front-End Development
allService.subTitle: Creating responsive, interactive user interfaces using React, Angular, Vue.js, and other modern front-end technologies.

allService.title: Mobile App Development
allService.subTitle: Building cross-platform mobile applications using React Native with focus on performance and user experience.

allService.title: Content Management
allService.subTitle: Implementing CMS solutions using WordPress with custom themes and plugins to meet specific client requirements.

allExperience.companyDescription: Successfully completed various web development and software projects on Khamsat, providing tailored digital solutions to clients with a focus on quality, communication, and client satisfaction. Key contributions include collaborating with clients to understand requirements and deliver customized solutions, developing websites, applications, and other services across different technologies, and ensuring timely delivery and high client satisfaction through efficient processes and clear communication.

Supported project management tasks, combining programming expertise with client communication to deliver IT solutions. Collaborated with teams to ensure project milestones were achieved efficiently and effectively.
Conducted coaching sessions to enhance IT students' skills in programming and development frameworks, providing practical project guidance and career advice for job readiness.

allTestimonial.reviewText: Salama delivered our web application on time and with exceptional quality. His expertise in the MEAN stack and ability to understand our business requirements resulted in a product that exceeded our expectations. Highly recommended for any web development project.

Working with Salama was a great experience. He was responsive, professional, and attentive to details. His technical skills are impressive, and he was able to recommend solutions that we hadn't considered. We'll definitely work with him again on future projects.

As a coach, Salama has helped many of our students develop practical skills that are highly valued in the industry. His teaching approach combines theory with hands-on projects, which has resulted in improved job placement rates for our graduates.

sectionHeading.title: Let's Discuss Your Project
sectionHeading.subTitle: Available for freelancing if the right project comes along. Feel free to contact me to discuss your web development needs.
